Package ohos.media.camera.device

Interface CameraConfig


  • public interface CameraConfig
    An interface used for configuring the camera.

    This interface facilitates the configuration of, for example, surfaces used for camera output streams and callbacks of frame capture results.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#CAMERA

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static interface  CameraConfig.Builder
      Used to create a CameraConfig instance.

      • equals

        boolean equals​(Object obj)
        Checks whether this CameraConfig object equals a specified object.

        The two objects are equal only when all their elements are the same, including the Surface list, DeferredSurface list, FrameStateCallBack object, and running mode.

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        obj - Indicates the specified object to compare.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the two objects are equal; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        Object.hashCode(), HashMap
